attributes.long-description:
Follow the journey of Haku, Kuon, and Oshtor from their humble origins in Mask of Deception to the epic global conflict of Mask of Truth! What begins as a simple mercenary job soon escalates into one brutal war after another, full of bold gambits and tense faceoffs... from both the warriors on the field, and the lofty politicians behind them.

Ultimately, the 'heroes' may be the only ones who can discover the truth behind all the bloodshed, treachery, and ancient secrets of the land...

Utawarerumono illustrates a rich, storied world and staggeringly deep relationships between characters explored in traditional visual novel style with the original Japanese voice performances accelerated by tactfully crafted fast-paced strategy RPG combat that highlights unique mechanics.

This bundle includes both Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth.



Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

attributes.name: Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Truth Bundle
